item.title: Can someone help plz? (clietn compiling error)
item.dc:creator: @pawelwoj pawelwoj
item.description:
@pawelwoj wrote:

kk so lets start:
my error is :

class30_sub2_sub1_sub1:58: cannot find symbol symbol: variable FileOperations location: class Class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().createImage(FileOperations.ReadFile(s)); ^ 1 error
this is it , the whole code is:

public Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1(String s) { direct = "./Lunar/"; ImageIcon imageicon = new ImageIcon(s); imageicon.getIconHeight(); imageicon.getIconWidth(); try { Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().createImage(FileOperations.ReadFile(s)); anInt1440 = imageicon.getIconWidth(); anInt1441 = imageicon.getIconHeight(); anInt1444 = anInt1440; anInt1445 = anInt1441; anInt1442 = 0; anInt1443 = 0; anIntArray1439 = new int[anInt1440 * anInt1441]; PixelGrabber pixelgrabber = new PixelGrabber(image, 0, 0, anInt1440, anInt1441, anIntArray1439, 0, anInt1440); pixelgrabber.grabPixels(); } catch(Exception exception) { } }
Can someone give me the good code or tell me how to fix mine?

when i run client it says:

Exception in thread "thread-6" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: FileOperations at Class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.<init><class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.java:58 at Class9.drawSpirite<class9.java:2054) .... ( alot of it ) caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: FileOperations

1 more thing.
How to make if i make my client jar file , to make background change if i change on my comp
(i heard its possible[ like that u upload file and put adress on] but when i upload 1 background and i wanna change
[like on uppit.com or mediafire] it gives different web-adress and its not working)
ANY1 have any ideas?
pawel

Read full topic
